text: Rudolf Schuster (born 4 January 1934) is a Slovakian politician. He was the President of Slovakia from 1999 to 2004. He was elected on 29 May 1999. In the April 2004 election, he lost to Ivan Gašparovič. He received only 7.4% of the vote. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Slovakia Category:Mayors
title: Rudolf Schuster
